FAQ

Do you use Amazon APIs?

No. All ordering is via headless Playwright automation.

How do errors show up?

Errors are logged, visible in the Errors page, and downloadable as CSV.

Can I test without buying?

Yes, enable dry-run mode in Settings.

How do I get started?

Sign up, connect Shopee and Amazon, set rules, activate, and monitor the dashboard.

Complete these steps to activate auto-shipping.
